span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 值得惋惜的，悲哀的： inspiring or deserving of lament or regret; deplorable or pitiable; mournful
【例】 The lamentable cries of the women for their lost sons were heard throughout the village. 女人们由于丧子之痛的哀嚎响彻整个山谷
【近】 deplorable, distressful, grievous, heartbreaking,, lugubrious 悲哀的，悲惨的, plaintive, plangent, sorrowful, woeful
【反】 cheerful, delighted, jocund, jovial 欢乐的，快乐的
【记】lament 哀悼；悲叹；悔恨
